duties_responsibilities.duty: Create valuable and engaging content for clients' and agency social media platforms.
Work with account managers, designers, and digital team to create relevant and timely social campaigns and contests.
Manage strategy and execution of social media campaigns across agency accounts.
Serve as a direct supervisor to Digital Executives.
Communicate with clients on a proactive basis and set weekly calls.
Produce written and digital content for various platforms.
Pull reports and analyze data to improve interaction and engagement, as well as create meaningful results for clients.

education_certification.credential: BA or BS in communications, graphic design, journalism, or public relations (or equivalent)
